cards.title: AI course for Innopolis' summer school
cards.text: Together with my partner, we have created and taught an offline master class on AI at Innopolis University as a part of the "Smart Vacation" summer course. We have prepared interactive materials for learning Python and developed an AI game simulator in Unity.

cards.title: Created App Concept for Kruzok Movement
cards.text: Our team (of two people) has developed the concept, design, and corresponding functionality of the site on a commercial basis. At the moment, the platform is in beta testing.

cards.title: Screen Puzzle
cards.text: App that allows users to assemble mobile video walls of various shapes from available Android-devices. Has a patent and includes a scientific paper. Winner of Sumsung and POST-ISEF contests.

cards.title: Innopolis' remote internship
cards.text: I was a team leader of the Android Development department during a remote internship at Innopolis. The beta version of the application was created by my team, and now, after being completed by the students, is used by the universities guests.

cards.title: Crew Street
cards.text: A web application that helps companies find ideal candidates for junior specialist vacancies, and also helps inexperienced developers find their first job.

cards.title: Hackathons
cards.text: I participate in local Android development hackathons. For example, the team in which I was a team leader has developed an application that allows you to remotely collect the data of a greenhouse and manage its irrigation systems.
